mapper.sql: INSURED_NO, ID, OWNER, SALE_ORDER_NO, INSURED_NAME, INSURED_CERTI_TYPE, INSURED_CERTI_NO, POLICY_NO, ELE_URL, INSURED_BIRTHDAY, INSURED_SEX, INSURED_PHONE, INSURED_EMAIL, PREMIUM, BENEFICIARY_TYPE, CUSTOMER_RELATIONS, INSURANCE_NUM, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR, MODIFIER, VALID,ERROR_MESSAGE,INSURE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
from INS_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL where INSURED_NO = #{insuredNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ISREPORT='0'

select
from INS_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL where SALE_ORDER_NO = #{saleOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ISREPORT='0'

select isod.INSURED_NO, isod.ID, isod.OWNER, isod.SALE_ORDER_NO, isod.INSURED_NAME, isod.INSURED_CERTI_TYPE, isod.INSURED_CERTI_NO, isod.POLICY_NO, isod.ELE_URL, isod.INSURED_BIRTHDAY, isod.INSURED_SEX, isod.INSURED_PHONE, isod.INSURED_EMAIL,isod.PREMIUM, isod.BENEFICIARY_TYPE, isod.CUSTOMER_RELATIONS, isod.INSURANCE_NUM, isod.STATUS, isod.CREATE_TIME, isod.MODIFY_TIME, isod.CREATOR, isod.MODIFIER, isod.VALID,dsi.TICKET_NO,dsi.PNR,isod.INSURE_TIME FROM INS_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL isod LEFT JOIN INS_SALE_ORDER_EXT isoe ON isod.SALE_ORDER_NO=isoe.SALE_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN DPS_SALE ds ON ds.TRADE_NO=isoe.TRANSACTION_ID LEFT JOIN DPS_SALE_ITEM dsi ON ds.ID = dsi.SALE_ID AND isod.INSURED_NAME=dsi.NAME AND isoe.EXTENDED_FIELDS_JSON LIKE CONCAT('%',dsi.FLIGHT_NO,'%') where isod.SALE_ORDER_NO = #{saleOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into INS_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL (INSURED_NO, ID, OWNER, SALE_ORDER_NO, INSURED_NAME, INSURED_CERTI_TYPE, INSURED_CERTI_NO, POLICY_NO, ELE_URL, INSURED_BIRTHDAY, INSURED_SEX, INSURED_PHONE, INSURED_EMAIL, PREMIUM, BENEFICIARY_TYPE, CUSTOMER_RELATIONS, INSURANCE_NUM, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR, MODIFIER, VALID,ISREPORT,ERROR_MESSAGE ) values (#{insuredNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insuredName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredCertiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredCertiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insuredPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{premium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beneficiaryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerRelations,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=BIT},#{isReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update INS_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL
ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SALE_ORDER_NO = #{saleOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
INSURED_NAME = #{insuredName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURED_CERTI_TYPE = #{insuredCertiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURED_CERTI_NO = #{insuredCertiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLICY_NO = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELE_URL = #{eleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURED_BIRTHDAY = #{insuredBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURED_SEX = #{insuredSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INSURED_PHONE = #{insuredPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURED_EMAIL = #{insuredEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREMIUM = #{premium,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BENEFICIARY_TYPE = #{beneficiaryType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUSTOMER_RELATIONS = #{customerRelations,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURANCE_NUM = #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT},
ERROR_MESSAGE = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURE_TIME = #{insureTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INSURED_NO = #{insuredNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update INS_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL set ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SALE_ORDER_NO = #{saleOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, INSURED_NAME = #{insuredName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURED_CERTI_TYPE = #{insuredCertiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURED_CERTI_NO = #{insuredCertiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POLICY_NO = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELE_URL = #{eleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURED_BIRTHDAY = #{insuredBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURED_SEX = #{insuredSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INSURED_PHONE = #{insuredPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURED_EMAIL = #{insuredEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREMIUM = #{premium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BENEFICIARY_TYPE = #{beneficiaryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUSTOMER_RELATIONS = #{customerRelations,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURANCE_NUM = #{insuranceNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT}, ERROR_MESSAGE = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INSURED_NO = #{insuredNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
